content.question: You will participate in a simulated conversation. Each time it is your turn to speak, you will have 20 seconds to record. You should respond as fully and as appropriately as possible. There will be six times when it is your turn to speak. You will have a conversation with Li Yan, co-leader, along with you, of the Chinese Club at your school, about planning the upcoming Chinese Cultural Festival. Prompt 1
